text: Anders Larsson, (born 3 October 1961 in Karlstad, Sweden) is a Swedish former cross-country skier representing Bondsjöhöjdens IK in club competitions during his career.SOK - Anders Larsson He also participated at the 1984 Olympic Winter Games in Sarajevo, finishing 39th in the 50 kilometers race. He also won Vasaloppet in 1987SVT - Vasaloppets alla vinnare and in 1982 he was awarded the Sixten Jernberg Award.Svenska skidförbundet - Sixten Jerring- priset ==Cross-country skiing results== All results are sourced from the International Ski Federation (FIS). ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border- collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" !
